ValidationRule.description: Regular expression to disallow special characters on fields Conference Number Dialed, User's Number Dialed From, and User's Number Dialed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.Override_Validation_Rules__c = False, $User.Profile_Name_Text__c <> "System Administrator", NOT(ISCHANGED(IsUpdateFromCaseComment__c)), OR( CONTAINS(Conference_Number_Dialed__c, '('), CONTAINS(Conference_Number_Dialed__c, ')'), CONTAINS(Conference_Number_Dialed__c, '+'), CONTAINS(Conference_Number_Dialed__c, '-'), CONTAINS(Conference_Number_Dialed__c, '#'), CONTAINS(User_s_Number_Dialed_From__c, '('), CONTAINS(User_s_Number_Dialed_From__c, ')'), CONTAINS(User_s_Number_Dialed_From__c, '+'), CONTAINS(User_s_Number_Dialed_From__c, '-'), CONTAINS(User_s_Number_Dialed_From__c, '#'), CONTAINS(User_s_Number_Dialed__c, '('), CONTAINS(User_s_Number_Dialed__c, ')'), CONTAINS(User_s_Number_Dialed__c, '+'), CONTAINS(User_s_Number_Dialed__c, '-'), CONTAINS(User_s_Number_Dialed__c, '#') ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Conference Number Dialed, User's Number Dialed From, and User's Number Dialed fields cannot contain the following special characters: ( ) + - #
